mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT WAY_CODE AS wayCode, WAY_NAME AS wayName FROM pd_orderlevel AS A
SELECT LGCS_AREA_CODE AS lgcsAreaCode, LGCS_AREA_NAME AS lgcsAreaName FROM md_logistics_area ORDER BY (LGCS_AREA_ID+0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pd_logiarea_orderlevel ( CLASSES_CODE, BREED_CODE, MACHINING_CODE, FEATURE_CODE, WEIGHT_CODE, PKG_CODE, GRADE_CODE, LOGIAREA_CODE, ORDERLEVEL_CODE, ORDERLEVEL_NAME, PRICE_PERCENT, BOX_CNTLVL, BOX_CNTMIN, BOX_CNTMAX, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, VER ) VALUES ( #{classesCode}, #{breedCode}, #{machiningCode}, #{featureCode}, #{weightCode}, #{pkgCode}, #{gradeCode}, #{logiareaCode}, #{orderlevelCode}, #{orderlevelName}, #{pricePercent}, #{boxCnt}, #{boxCntmin}, #{boxCntmax}, #{delFlg}, #{crtId}, now(), #{ver} )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.PRICECYCLE_PERIOD AS pricecyclePeriod, A.PDT_MIXCODE AS pdtMixcode, A.CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode, A.CLASSES_NAME AS classesName, A.MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode, A.MACHINING_NAME AS machiningName, A.BREED_CODE AS breedCode, A.BREED_NAME AS breedName, A.FEATURE_CODE AS featureCode, A.FEATURE_NAME AS featureName, A.WEIGHT_CODE AS weightCode, A.PKG_CODE AS pkgCode, A.GRADE_CODE AS gradeCode, A.PDT_NAME AS pdtName, A.LOGIAREA_CODE AS logiareaCode, A.LOGIAREA_NAME AS logiareaName, A.ORDERLEVEL_CODE AS orderlevelCode, A.ORDERLEVEL_NAME AS orderlevelName, A.NETWEIGHT AS netweight, A.PRICEOFKG AS priceofkg, A.PRICEOFBOX AS priceofbox, A.DEL_FLG AS delFlg, A.CRT_ID AS crtId, A.CRT_TIME AS crtTime, A.UPD_ID AS updId, A.UPD_TIME AS updTime, A.ACT_ID AS actId, A.ACT_TIME AS actTime, A.VER AS ver FROM pd_priceprd_logiarea AS A
A.PRICECYCLE_ID=#{filterMap.pricecycleId}
